mn110:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
mn110:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava tadahuposathe pannarase punnaya punnamaya rattiya bhikkhusanghaparivuto abbhokase nisinno hoti.
mn110:2.2: Atha kho bhagava tunhibhutam tunhibhutam bhikkhusangham anuviloketva bhikkhu amantesi:
mn110:3.5: atthanametam, bhikkhave, anavakaso yam asappuriso asappurisam janeyya:
mn110:3.11: etampi kho, bhikkhave, atthanam anavakaso yam asappuriso sappurisam janeyya:
mn110:4.1: Asappuriso, bhikkhave, assaddhammasamannagato hoti, asappurisabhatti hoti, asappurisacinti hoti, asappurisamanti hoti, asappurisavaco hoti, asappurisakammanto hoti, asappurisaditthi hoti; asappurisadanam deti.
mn110:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappi hoti, appassuto hoti, kusito hoti, mutthassati hoti, duppanno hoti.
mn110:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso assaddhammasamannagato hoti.
mn110:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, asappurisassa ye te samanabrahmana assaddha ahirika anottappino appassuta kusita mutthassatino duppanna tyassa mitta honti te sahaya.
mn110:6.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisabhatti hoti.
mn110:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso attabyabadhayapi ceteti, parabyabadhayapi ceteti, ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti.
mn110:7.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisacinti hoti.
mn110:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso attabyabadhayapi manteti, parabyabadhayapi manteti, ubhayabyabadhayapi manteti.
mn110:8.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisamanti hoti.
mn110:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso musavadi hoti, pisunavaco hoti, pharusavaco hoti, samphappalapi hoti.
mn110:9.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisavaco hoti.
mn110:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso panatipati hoti, adinnadayi hoti, kamesumicchacari hoti.
mn110:10.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisakammanto hoti.
mn110:11.3: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mata, natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna, ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
mn110:11.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisaditthi hoti.
mn110:12.2: Idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso asakkaccam danam deti, asahattha danam deti, acittikatva danam deti, apavittham danam deti anagamanaditthiko danam deti.
mn110:12.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisadanam deti.
mn110:13.1: So, bhikkhave, asappuriso evam assaddhammasamannagato, evam asappurisabhatti, evam asappurisacinti, evam asappurisamanti, evam asappurisavaco, evam asappurisakammanto, evam asappurisaditthi;
mn110:13.2: evam asappurisadanam datva kayassa bheda param marana ya asappurisanam gati tattha upapajjati.
mn110:14.1: Janeyya nu kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisam:
mn110:14.5: thanametam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam sappuriso sappurisam janeyya:
mn110:15.2: etampi kho, bhikkhave, thanam vijjati yam sappuriso asappurisam janeyya:
mn110:15.4: Sappuriso, bhikkhave, saddhammasamannagato hoti, sappurisabhatti hoti, sappurisacinti hoti, sappurisamanti hoti, sappurisavaco hoti, sappurisakammanto hoti, sappurisaditthi hoti;
mn110:16.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso saddho hoti, hirima hoti, ottappi hoti, bahussuto hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, upatthitassati hoti, pannava hoti.
mn110:16.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso saddhammasamannagato hoti.
mn110:17.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sappurisassa ye te samanabrahmana saddha hirimanto ottappino bahussuta araddhaviriya upatthitassatino pannavanto tyassa mitta honti, te sahaya.
mn110:17.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisabhatti hoti.
mn110:18.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso nevattabyabadhaya ceteti, na parabyabadhaya ceteti, na ubhayabyabadhaya ceteti.
mn110:18.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisacinti hoti.
mn110:19.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso nevattabyabadhaya manteti, na parabyabadhaya manteti, na ubhayabyabadhaya manteti.
mn110:19.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisamanti hoti.
mn110:20.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso musavada pativirato hoti, pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti, pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti, samphappalapa pativirato hoti.
mn110:20.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisavaco hoti.
mn110:21.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti.
mn110:21.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisakammanto hoti.
mn110:22.3: ‘atthi dinnam, atthi yittham, atthi hutam, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, atthi ayam loko, atthi paro loko, atthi mata, atthi pita, atthi satta opapatika, atthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
mn110:22.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisaditthi hoti.
mn110:23.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso sakkaccam danam deti, sahattha danam deti, cittikatva danam deti, anapavittham danam deti, agamanaditthiko danam deti.
mn110:23.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisadanam deti.
mn110:24.1: So, bhikkhave, sappuriso evam saddhammasamannagato, evam sappurisabhatti, evam sappurisacinti, evam sappurisamanti, evam sappurisavaco, evam sappurisakammanto, evam sappurisaditthi;
mn110:24.2: evam sappurisadanam datva kayassa bheda param marana ya sappurisanam gati tattha upapajjati.
mn110:25.2: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
